page.title: 03Bracknell Newspapers
page.content: The weekly Bracknell News and Bracknell Times report reguarly on the progress of{Gemma Knight. } Reporters telephone the USA everyweeek for newson the 2 year old Bracknell girl who has had two liver transplants .Press publicity helped to raise money for the trip to the USA. Opposition to the Heseltown plan to build homes near Warfield has also been reported regularly.The disapperance of 7 year old Mark Tildesley from a Wokingham fair in 1984,the serious fire at the Ladbroke Mercury Hotel,the loss of the Bracknell Jazz Festival and the brief school students' strike all made the headlines.Royal visits to Ascot races, Princess Anne opening Princess square shopping centre and Princess Diana's visit to Ravenswood Village for the handicapped have been reported.
